sentence.Network_en: The ticket for the Olympic Games closure will be finally made sure by sortition.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥运会开闭幕式门票实行抽签确定已成定局.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2009年4月17日 -  其实,在古希腊民主制下,抽签(Sortition)是挑选决策者的主要方式,它被认为是民主的基石。我在《民主四讲》里放了一个插图,是古希腊的抽签石,上面.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin sortitio(n-), from sortire 'divide or obtain by lot'

means.word_mean: 1. making a chance decision by using lots (straws or pebbles etc.) that are thrown or drawn
